think_procedure: First, I checked the type of the knob 'innodb_dedicated_server'. It is a boolean type knob, which means it can be set to either ON or OFF. Then, I looked at what happens when this knob is set to its different values. When it is enabled, it automatically configures certain settings. When it is disabled, these settings are not automatically configured. Therefore, this knob can be considered a 'special' knob as it has a special value (ON or 1) that changes the behavior of the DBMS.
